short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Magically turn all text into a pleasant readable format at the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Readable Mode makes reading on the web easier and more enjoyable! 

With just one click, you can transform cluttered pages into clean, distraction-free text.

Features:
	•	Strips away unnecessary formatting for better readability.
	•	Lets you adjust font size, spacing, and colors to your liking.
	•	Works with emails, articles, and more.
	•	Simple and lightweight—no sign-up required.
